en.title: FE Sponsors "Hope for Children" Event & Concert in Manila, Philippines, 06th & 07th February 2009!!
en.content:
FusionExcel International through the generosity of Mayor Marides C Fernando of Marikina, Manila, presents "HOPE4CHILDREN" a 2 nights benefit event and concert for underprivileged children featuring some of Philippines superstars, K 24/7, Jimmy Bondoc, DJ Mike, Luke Mejares, Paolo Santos, Top Suzara and Mike Chan. Feb 6th will be FusionExcel night and Feb 07th will be the all star concert starting at 6:30PM at the Marikina Sports Park, Basketball Gymnasium.

ADMISSION IS FREE!!!

For Free Ticket Inquiries, Contact 09228502197.
